import React from 'react' import './property-item.css' const PropertyItem = ({id, name, image, description, square, number_of_bedrooms, number_of_bathrooms, number_of_car_parking, onDeleteClick}) => (
{name}

{description}

{square} Sqft

{number_of_bedrooms}

2

3

) export default PropertyItem;
